resources.string:
" Cars4Sales an App that helps you get your car easier!
 Our designated grammar in the context-free format is
 exp ::= term | term ; exp
 term ::= keyword comparison value
 value ::= unsigned string | unsigned integer
 keyword ::= "name" | "location" | "price" | "year"
 comparison ::= "=" | "<" | ">"

To search the car you want, you can enter a query like
 below:

name = mini; price >50000;
 location = melbourne; year > 2000

It also works with partially correct queries.

For instance:

nNme= miNi ;pirCee> 50000;
 LoC =MelBoUrnE; yaeEr > 2000

"
